## Import some data

I want to import `FAS_litters.csv`.

```{r}
setwd("")

litters_df = read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")
```
Now I want better names.

```{r}
names(litters_df)

litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Let's look at the dataset.

```{r}
litters_df

head(litter_df)
tail(litter_df)
```
One I use a lot is

```{r, eval=FALSE}
view(litter_df)
```
Here's `skimer`
```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
